page.title: 02WEST FELTON IAN'S FARM
page.content: We have 37 acres of land;17 acres is hay and other 20 acres is pasture.We have 2 fields of hay and 5 fields of pasture.This makes a total of 7 fiel- ds.We have 34 milking cows,16 heifer- s,1calf and 3 store cattle.We have six laying hens and a cockerel.We also have 13 chickens for killing. My Dad kills them. Mum and Grandma feather them.After, we take all their guts out and put them in a bucket.Then I have to dig a hole about 3-4 feet deep and 2 foot wide and bury them. In July we have about 100 day old turkey chicks.We fatten them on turkey grower.Before Christmas Dad will gut and dress them and we will sell them for Â£1 a pound. We have 3 cade lambs: 2 ewes and 1 ram.The ram is mine and I'm going to sell it at the market in Oswestry.It should make about Â£40.
